S04bsu006_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahātā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:3_0: tadyathā āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā
S04bsu006_u:3_1: ca vakkulena āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇena maitrāyaṇīputreṇa ca śrāvakaniyutaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:4: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthurdvātriṃśatā bodhisattvasahasraiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:5_0: tadyathā sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartanena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anikṣiptadhureṇa
S04bsu006_u:5_1: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avalokiteśvareṇa
S04bsu006_u:5_2: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
S04bsu006_u:7: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthuḥ /
S04bsu006_u:8: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramātraḥ śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /
S04bsu006_u:11: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ śrutamātreṇa pātraṃ cakrikaṃ śikyaṃ bhagavate upanāmayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:13: yadā tvaṃ praviśasi piṇḍapātika vimocaye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi prāṇinām /
S04bsu006_u:14: uttāraye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi sattvā narakabhayājjātijarāmahābhayā //
S04bsu006_u:16: mahānubhāvo varadakṣiṇīyo vimocayitvā punaraṃ hi āgamī //
S04bsu006_u:17: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:18: atha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:19: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā hiraṇyamayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:20: tathā śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito 'bhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:21: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:28: tatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:31: atha sa janakāyastaṃ jīrṇakaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtāñjalirevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:32: yattasya bhagavatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya guṇavarṇasamudīraṇasamaye idaṃ śubhanimittamabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:33: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:34: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣastaṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:35: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe saṃsāraduḥkhā vinimuktu so naro /
S04bsu006_u:36: āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate svargaṃ ca so yāsyati śīghramevam //
S04bsu006_u:37: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe dṛḍhapratijño bahukalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:39: so bodhisattvo sthita gaṅgavālukān kadāci so gacchati durgatī bhayam /
S04bsu006_u:40: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate //
S04bsu006_u:41: kalpānakoṭīnayutānacintiyā rājā sa bhotī sada cakravartī /
S04bsu006_u:43: yat kiñci pūrvaṃ sada pāpu yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat /
S04bsu006_u:45: sukhāvatīṃ gacchati buddhakṣetraṃ paryaṅkabaddho sa ca bodhisattvo /
S04bsu006_u:47: apāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhārayet /
S04bsu006_u:48: atha sa jīrṇakaḥ purūṣo janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:49: atha bhagavān pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhut /
S04bsu006_u:50: tatra ca nagaradvāre dvādaśakoṭyaḥ padmānāṃ prādurabhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:51: teṣu ca padmeṣu dvādaśakoṭyo bodhisattvānāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ (Asv 107)
S04bsu006_u:53_0: atha bhagavataḥ praviṣṭamātreṇa śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ navanavatikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu006_u:54: atha bhagavān ānandena saha nagaravalambikāyā dārikāya gṛhe samāgato 'bhūta /
S04bsu006_u:55: atha bhagavān nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu006_u:56: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃśayajātābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:58: mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:59: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāramasiṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:60: atha sā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā paridevantī aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:61: aho bata duḥkhu daridrake gṛhe varaṃ mama maraṇu na cāpi jīvitam /
S04bsu006_u:62: kiṃ cāpi me kāryuṣu jīvitena yadyaivāhaṃ duḥkhu śarīra pīḍitam //
S04bsu006_u:64: anāthabhūtā ahamadyameva yadyaivāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe // (Asv 108)
S04bsu006_u:65: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt /
S04bsu006_u:68: anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:69_0: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ
S04bsu006_u:69_1: gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā yena nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhaṃ tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:71: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imānyanekaśatasahasramūlyānyābharaṇāni /
S04bsu006_u:72: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantamupanāmaya /
S04bsu006_u:73: atha sā dārikā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntā /
S04bsu006_u:76: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhūkkakutasundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:78: atha sā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā (Asv 109)
S04bsu006_u:80: anena piṇḍapātakuśalamūlena mā kaśmiṃścid daridragṛhe upapadyeya /
S04bsu006_u:81: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavate dattvā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:86: atha sā dārikā pratinivṛtya sarvāṅgapraṇipātena bhagavantaṃ prapatitā /
S04bsu006_u:87: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:88: avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā yenāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe /
S04bsu006_u:89: karohi kāruṇya mamaṃ hi duḥkhita vinivartayasva narakā hi pālān //
S04bsu006_u:90: karohi kāruṇya mama duḥkhitāyā istribhāvā upapannu nāyaka /
S04bsu006_u:91: tvaṃ lokanātha jaravyādhiśoka vimocaye maṃ mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
S04bsu006_u:92: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ vimocayāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:93: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe // (Asv 110)
S04bsu006_u:94: tiṣṭhanti ye vai daśasu diśāsu sattvā hi sarve sukhitā kariṣye /
S04bsu006_u:95: sarve ca haṃ mocayi duḥkhasāgarāt trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
S04bsu006_u:96: tvayaṃ hi nātha mayi mocayī jagat avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā /
S04bsu006_u:97: yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe trāṇaṃ bhavāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
S04bsu006_u:98: bhavaṃ tu nātha jaravyādhimocakaṃ trāṇaṃ bhavāhī guṇa sañcitāgra /
S04bsu006_u:99: na cā kariṣye punareva pāpaṃ yadvedayāmī imi vedanāni //
S04bsu006_u:100: kṛpaṃ jani...............magra sattvā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam /
S04bsu006_u:101: ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe nāmaṃ ca vai dhāraya paśca kāle //
S04bsu006_u:103: yatakiñci pāpaṃ tadapūrva yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat //
S04bsu006_u:104: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā punarapi gṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:107: pratinivartasva dārike pūrvajātinidānaṃ samanusmarāmi tadahaṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:109: parikīrtaya lokavināyakādya yadyat kṛtaṃ pāpa sadā sudāruṇam /
S04bsu006_u:110: avaśya me pāpu kṛtaṃ sudāruṇaṃ yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe //
S04bsu006_u:111: tvaṃ sārthavāhu iha sarvaloke vimocaye mam iha istribhāvā /
S04bsu006_u:112: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ kṛtajñahaṃ nitya bhavāmi nāyake //
S04bsu006_u:113: saṃśrāvaye mam imu dharmanetrī nāsau kadācittajate apāyam /
S04bsu006_u:114: saṃśodhayī karma yathākṛtaṃ mayā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
S04bsu006_u:115: asaṅgajñānī varalokanāyaka vandāmi nātha śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjalī //
S04bsu006_u:117_0: bhūtapūrvo dārike atīte 'dhvani asaṅkhyeyaiḥ kalpai ratnaśikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan
S04bsu006_u:117_2: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:118: tena (Asv 112) khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatī nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:119: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ padmaprabho nāma gṛhapatirabhūt /
S04bsu006_u:121: tena khalu punaḥ samayena grāmanagaranigamajanapadeṣu piṇḍapātiko bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātāyāvatarati /
S04bsu006_u:122: yadā tvadgṛhamāgato 'bhūta tadā tvaṃ dārike piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhānniṣkrāntā punareva praviṣṭā 'bhūḥ /
S04bsu006_u:124: tena karmopacayena tvayā dārike dvādaśakalpasahasrāṇi punaḥ punardaridragṛhe duḥkhānyanubhūtāni /
S04bsu006_u:125: ekena tvayā dārike kuśalamūlena bodhivyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyase /
S04bsu006_u:126_0: yattvayā tasya bhikṣo rūpaliṅgasaṃsthā na dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ dārike anāgate 'dhvani
S04bsu006_u:126_1: acintyairaparimāṇaiḥ kalpairnagaradhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
S04bsu006_u:126_2: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān loke /
S04bsu006_u:127: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvaivamāha /
S04bsu006_u:128: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan mama buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatraivāhaṃ buddho bhaviṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:131: yādṛaśī ca sā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ tādṛśaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:134: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
S04bsu006_u:136: tvaṃ dārike saptame divase kālaṃ kariṣyasi /
S04bsu006_u:140: tasya khalu punā rājño 'jitasenasya putro janiṣyase /
S04bsu006_u:141: eṣa eva tava paścimo garbhavāso bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:142: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:143: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:145: yadā tvayā āgatu piṇḍapātikā vimocayitvā iha sarvasattvā //
S04bsu006_u:146: sukhena saṃsthāpayi sarvasattvā maitrībalaṃ sarvajagattvayā kṛtam /
S04bsu006_u:147: sa piṇḍapātaṃ varamāṇḍanāyaka vimocitaste jagatī bhayā ca //
S04bsu006_u:148: ye bodhisattvā iha jambudvīpe sarve ca mārgaṃ tava darśayanti /
S04bsu006_u:149: (Asv 114) parinirvṛtasya sada paścakāle dhāretu sūtram imu buddhavarṇitam //
S04bsu006_u:152: athāyuṣmānānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratastasthau /
S04bsu006_u:160: ye kecidānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu006_u:165_0: śṛṇu ānanda ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmavipralope
S04bsu006_u:165_2: ye sattvā vā araṇyāyatane gaṇḍayākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:168: atha tena gaṇḍīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:169: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjante sma /
S04bsu006_u:170: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:172: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryāṃ kuru /
S04bsu006_u:178: na te sattvāste śakṣyante bālāgramapi kampayituṃ prāgeva jīvitādvyavaropayitum /
S04bsu006_u:179: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenānukrānto 'bhut /
S04bsu006_u:180: atha rājā ajitasenastaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:185: āgaccha mahāśrāvaka bhikṣo rājā te ājñāpayati /
S04bsu006_u:187: mama rājñā kiṃ kāryaṃ mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:190: na ca sa bhikṣustava pārśve āgacchati /
S04bsu006_u:194: atha sa rājā svakenaivātmabhāvena yena sa nandimitramahāśrāvakastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:196: āgaccha bho bhikṣo mama rājadhānīṃ praviśa /
S04bsu006_u:197: atha rājā ajitaseno dakṣiṇahaste taṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā svakāṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:198: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattamabhut /
S04bsu006_u:199: atha rājājitaseno bhadrapīṭhake niṣadya taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:203: ye kecid bhikṣupravrajitāste sarve bhikṣāhārāḥ piṇḍapātamavacarantaḥ paribhuñjanti /
S04bsu006_u:207: yadi te bhikṣo mama svamāṃsena kāryaṃ svamāṃsaṃ dāsyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:209: bhuñjāmi tadbhojanu yad dadāhi mṛṣṭānnapānaṃ rasapānamuktamam /
S04bsu006_u:210: kleśā hi nirmukta tvayā bhaviṣyasi sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābham //
S04bsu006_u:211: sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakasya śraddhāprasādaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham /
S04bsu006_u:212: ye śāsane pravrajitā ca bhikṣavā sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakānām //
S04bsu006_u:213: sudurlabhaṃ sugatavarasya darśanaṃ namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvo /
S04bsu006_u:214: namo 'stu te dharmamayaṃ mahāmune namo 'stu te kleśavicakṣaṇāryam //
S04bsu006_u:215: namo 'stu te sarvajarapramokṣaṇāt namo 'stu te mārganidarśanāryam /
S04bsu006_u:216: namo 'stu te mārgapathasya darśakaṃ namo 'stu te bodhipathasya darśakam //
S04bsu006_u:217: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:218: atha rājānamajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:219: sudurlabhaṃ bhikṣu tathaiva darśanaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya bhaveya darśanam / (Asv 118)
S04bsu006_u:220: ye bhikṣusaṅghasya dadeya dānaṃ na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāśca //
S04bsu006_u:221: na pretakuṣmāṇḍamahoragāśca vighnaṃ na kurvanti kadāci teṣām /
S04bsu006_u:222: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya manuṣyalābham //
S04bsu006_u:223: yo durlabhaṃ darśanu bhikṣubhāvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ kalpaśatairacintiyaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:224: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhāraye kalpāna koṭīnayutānacintiyā //
S04bsu006_u:225: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam /
S04bsu006_u:226: na tasya bhotī vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam //
S04bsu006_u:229: yo dāsyate asya hi piṇḍapātaṃ muktā na bheṣyanti jarārtavyādhayā //
S04bsu006_u:230: kleśā vinirmukta sadā tu bheṣyati ye tasya dāsyantiha piṇḍapātam //
S04bsu006_u:231: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:234: evamastu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapāta tava gṛhe /
S04bsu006_u:235: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:237: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmirasti /
S04bsu006_u:247: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇāste sarve santīti /
S04bsu006_u:248: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyastāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyastā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:252: (Asv 120) ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilādayaste nānārutāni kurvanti sma /
S04bsu006_u:253: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:255: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:261: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:263: aśokamucilinda tathaiva pāṭalā saugandhikāśca sumanā ca vārṣikā //
S04bsu006_u:264: tadā pāriyātrā nadītīranirmitā suvarṇavarṇā sada pakṣiṇā abhūt /
S04bsu006_u:268: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:269: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma /
S04bsu006_u:273: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
S04bsu006_u:275: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghrameva tad hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:276: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmistenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:278: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:288: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
S04bsu006_u:291: maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānamajitasenamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:294: tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṅkramaḥ kārayitavyaścaturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa /
S04bsu006_u:295: atha so 'mātyastaṃ caṅkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:296: kṛtaṃ mayā caṅkramu suṣṭhu śobhanaṃ ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvameva ca /
S04bsu006_u:297: sattvāna moceti prakṛtiṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vimocaye prāṇina sarvametat //
S04bsu006_u:298: aho sulabdhā praṇidhīkṛtaṃ tvayā vimocayī sarvajagat sadevakam /
S04bsu006_u:299: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yattvayamīdṛśaṃ bhave dharmaṃ prakāśeti me dharmabhāṇako //
S04bsu006_u:300: niṣaṇṇa sthitvā kuṭikā ca caṅkrame ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
S04bsu006_u:301: sa caṅkramaṃ caiva kṛtaṃ suśobhanaṃ maṇiratnasañcchādita taṃ ca bhūmim //
S04bsu006_u:302: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:304: kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:305: anyena keśānanyena nayānānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:306: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati /
S04bsu006_u:310: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:311: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:312: santrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭyan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:315: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
S04bsu006_u:316: mā śokacittasya bhave nṛpendra mā vedayī vedanamīdṛśāni /
S04bsu006_u:317: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi /
S04bsu006_u:320: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:328: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim /
S04bsu006_u:330: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:332: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:334: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṅgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham /
S04bsu006_u:337: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sa caṅkramastenopasaṅkrāntau /
S04bsu006_u:340: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipaṭṭaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti /
S04bsu006_u:347: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam /
S04bsu006_u:350: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṅkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:353: ye darśanaṃ dāsyati tubhyamārṣā muktā ca so bheṣyati kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
S04bsu006_u:354: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute muhūrtam //
S04bsu006_u:356: niṣadya yugye ratanāmaye śubhe vrajāmyahaṃ yena sa rājadhānīm /
S04bsu006_u:358: sūkṣmāṇi jālāni ca saṃhitāni yāṃ cīvarāṃ tubhya dadāmi adya //
S04bsu006_u:359: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:363: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ te bodhimaṇḍena cireṇa gacchata //
S04bsu006_u:364: sudurlabhaṃ darśana nāyakasya na cireṇa so gacchati buddhakṣetram /
S04bsu006_u:366: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:367: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma /
S04bsu006_u:368: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ /
S04bsu006_u:371: saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
S04bsu006_u:372: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya (Asv 127) /
S04bsu006_u:375: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:376: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayata /
S04bsu006_u:378: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan /
S04bsu006_u:379: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:382: atra śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
S04bsu006_u:383: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:384: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:385: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṅkramate sma /
S04bsu006_u:386: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:387: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:388: uttiṣṭha mahārāja kasyārthe prapatitaḥ / rājā āha / (Asv 128)
S04bsu006_u:390: na me kadācidiha dṛṣṭarūpaṃ tvaṃ lokanātho varadakṣiṇīyo //
S04bsu006_u:392: dvātṛṃśatā lakṣaṇadhāriṇaṃ mune nāsau kadācidvrajate apāyabhūmim /
S04bsu006_u:393: yo lokanāthasya hi rūpu paśye tvaṃ lokanāthā śirasā namasyāmī //
S04bsu006_u:396: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:397: alabdhalābhā ye tatra mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati /
S04bsu006_u:399: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu006_u:400: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣuṃ purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma /
S04bsu006_u:401: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni (Asv 129)
S04bsu006_u:404: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni /
S04bsu006_u:405: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ /
S04bsu006_u:407: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha /
S04bsu006_u:411: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavān /
S04bsu006_u:412: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ /
S04bsu006_u:413: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti /
S04bsu006_u:422: mā vilamba kurute tāta mā khedaṃ kiñci yāsyasi /
S04bsu006_u:423: aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna darśanaṃ aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna lābham //
S04bsu006_u:424: aho sulabdhaṃ paramaṃ hi lābhaṃ pravrajyalābhaṃ sugatena varṇitam /
S04bsu006_u:425: saṃsāramokṣo sugatena varṇitaṃ pravrajya śīghraṃ ma vilamba tāta //
S04bsu006_u:427: sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ darśanu nāyakānām /
S04bsu006_u:428: śīghaṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ prāptaṃ mayā uttamamagrabodhim /
S04bsu006_u:429: śrutvā na rājā tada putravākyaṃ sa pravrajī śāsani nāyakasya //
S04bsu006_u:430: atha rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:431: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra (Asv 131)
S04bsu006_u:432: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma /
S04bsu006_u:435: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:438: bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastena gamanamārabdhavān /
S04bsu006_u:440: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:444: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:445_1: 'rhan samyak sambuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu006_u:445_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu006_u:450: (Asv 132) ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:452: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:454: aparimitaguṇasañcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu006_u:456: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye samprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:458: yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisambuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisambhotsyante /
S04bsu006_u:459: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
S04bsu006_u:461: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ samprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kīdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu006_u:463: śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
S04bsu006_u:464: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ samprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu006_u:466: ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam /
S04bsu006_u:476: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam /
S04bsu006_u:480: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepaṣyatha /
S04bsu006_u:483: kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati /
S04bsu006_u:485_0: ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmākrośiṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:485_1: paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyanti
S04bsu006_u:488: trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet /
S04bsu006_u:489: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtradhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate /
S04bsu006_u:492: na came īdṛśaṃ sūtraṃ śrutapūrvaṃ kadācana //
S04bsu006_u:494: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam //
S04bsu006_u:498: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavato gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
S04bsu006_u:501: subhāṣitaṃ sūtra mahānubhāvagaṃ gambhīradharmaṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśam // (Asv 135)
S04bsu006_u:502: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ niruttaraṃ mā paścakāle parinirvṛte jite /
S04bsu006_u:505: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāva prakāśitaṃ sutramidaṃ niruttaram /
S04bsu006_u:506: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyakā likhiṣyati sūtrametaṃ niruttaram //
S04bsu006_u:507: na cāpi so gacchati durgatībhayaṃ svargaṃ ca so gacchati kṣiprametat //
S04bsu006_u:511: ahaṃ hi paścime kāle nirvṛte tvayi nāyake /
S04bsu006_u:515: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvā prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tvayā śubham / (Asv 136)
S04bsu006_u:516: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyaka rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi ha sūtraratne //
S04bsu006_u:518: aho suramyaṃ varasūtraratnaṃ prakāśitam īdṛśa paścakāle /
S04bsu006_u:520: sugatāna vai lokavināyakānāṃ ahaṃ hi dhāriṣyam sūtraratnam /
S04bsu006_u:524: deyadharmoyaṃ bālosiṃhena sārdha bhāryājājatitrana sārdhaṃ mātāpitroḥ paramaduṣkartroḥ sārdhaṃ kṣīṇīena akhiloṭiena diśoṭajāja maṅgali.......
